body_html: I'd probably expect it to match the local filesystem conventions. I can't find anything in the documentation for the Win32 API about case sensitivity, but I believe NTFS is case sensitive, so matching the Linux behavior seems good.
body_text: I'd probably expect it to match the local filesystem conventions. I can't find anything in the documentation for the Win32 API about case sensitivity, but I believe NTFS is case sensitive, so matching the Linux behavior seems good.
body: I'd probably expect it to match the local filesystem conventions. I can't find anything in the documentation for the Win32 API about case sensitivity, but I believe NTFS is case sensitive, so matching the Linux behavior seems good.
